tutorial.speak:
You can create a curated calendar for your website. From the B1.church Dashboard click on B1.Church
Click your name then Click the Admin Portal
From the dashboard navigate to the Website section
Click on Calendars from the top navigation
Click Add Calendar to create a new curated calendar
Give your calendar a name and click Create
Click on the manage events icon to configure your new calendar
Click Add in the Groups in Calendar section to add groups
Select a group from the dropdown menu
Choose whether to add all events or specific events then click Save
Add as many groups as you want to include in your curated calendar
Click Subscribe to copy the ICS link or download the file to share your calendar. Your calendar can now be embeded on your website and mobile app.
